secText:
Lesson:
1. Explain period of a function and relate that to frequency. (lesson 1.10)
2. Show the midline and amplitude of a function. (all are same lesson).
3. Show how to graph y = sin x + 2 and how to graph y = 2 cos x.

In-class assessment:
1. Have students graph y = 3sin x − 1. Have them state its period, frequency, midline and amplitude.
